overview: Explores the role of the MTA in New York City and the impact that the Covid-19 pandemic had on the vital service it provides: transporting New Yorkâ€™s essential workers. The film acknowledges the decline of the subway infrastructure as a political issue and captures a tumultuous time that impacted every city in America. This film poses the question: what happens when the lifeline of a city goes flat?
tagline: An American infrastructure story of rot in the Big Apple's core.
title: End of the Line
